body.en:
{greeting}

It looks like you sent this email directly to aInbox. Right now, aInbox works by summarizing *forwarded* emails.

To get a summary, just forward the email you want summarized to summary@ainbox.io — you'll receive a summary within seconds.

Direct email summarization is coming soon — stay tuned!

— aInbox
body.zh:
{greeting}

看起来你直接发送了邮件给 aInbox。目前 aInbox 只支持摘要转发的邮件。

使用方法：将你想摘要的邮件转发到 summary@ainbox.io，几秒内就能收到摘要。

直接发送邮件的摘要功能即将上线，敬请期待！

— aInbox

body.en:
{greeting}

Sorry, something went wrong while processing your email. Please try forwarding it again in a few minutes.

If this keeps happening, let us know at {feedbackEmail}.

— aInbox
body.zh:
{greeting}

抱歉，处理您的邮件时出现了问题。请稍后重新转发这封邮件再试一次。

如果问题持续出现，请联系 {feedbackEmail}。

— aInbox
